_examples.PRE-MARKUP: John tied on a match of chess with Steve.
John listened to Pink with Steve at Anna's apartment on his iPod.
John created an exercise plan with Steve.

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示当前执行操作的状态
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current disposition of the Action.
_properties.rdfs:label: actionStatus

_properties.descriptionZh: 发起作用（或产生某种结果）的人或物
_properties.rdfs:comment: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate). e.g. John wrote a book.
_properties.rdfs:label: agent

_properties.descriptionZh: 事件的结束时间
_properties.rdfs:comment:
The endTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to end. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.
_properties.rdfs:label: endTime

_properties.descriptionZh: 对于失败的操作，有关故障原因的更多信息。
_properties.rdfs:comment: For failed actions, more information on the cause of the failure.
_properties.rdfs:label: error

_properties.descriptionZh: 工作时所需用的器具
_properties.rdfs:comment: The object that helped the agent perform the action. e.g. John wrote a book with a pen.
_properties.rdfs:label: instrument

_examples.MICRODATA:

    1938 tickets left

_properties.descriptionZh: 地址
_properties.rdfs:comment: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.
_properties.rdfs:label: location

_properties.descriptionZh: 动作在其上执行的对象，其状态保持完整或更改
_properties.rdfs:comment: The object upon which the action is carried out, whose state is kept intact or changed. Also known as the semantic roles patient, affected or undergoer (which change their state) or theme (which doesn't). e.g. John read a book.
_properties.rdfs:label: object

_properties.descriptionZh: 间接参与行动的其他人。 例如 约翰与史蒂夫写了一本书
_properties.rdfs:comment: Other co-agents that participated in the action indirectly. e.g. John wrote a book with Steve.
_properties.rdfs:label: participant

_properties.descriptionZh: 行动的结果。例如约翰写了一本书。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The result produced in the action. e.g. John wrote a book.
_properties.rdfs:label: result

_properties.descriptionZh: 某事的预期开始时间。对于跨越一段时间的动作。例如，约翰从１月到１２月写了一本书。注意：事件使用startDate / endDate而不是startTime / endTime，即使用时间描述日期。 今后的修订可能会澄清这种情况。
_properties.rdfs:comment:
The startTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to start. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.
_properties.rdfs:label: startTime

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示行动的目标入口点
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a target EntryPoint for an Action.
_properties.rdfs:label: target

_pTree.descriptionZh: 由直接代理人和间接参与者在一个直接对象上执行的操作。 有时可以在一个有无生命仪器帮助的地点发生。 该动作的执行可能会产生一个结果。 具体操作子类型文档指定每个参数/角色的准确期望值。 另请参阅博客文章和操作概述文档。
_pTree.rdfs:comment:
An action performed by a direct agent and indirect participants upon a direct object. Optionally happens at a location with the help of an inanimate instrument. The execution of the action may produce a result. Specific action sub-type documentation specifies the exact expectation of each argument/role.

See also blog post and Actions overview document.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Action

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的别名。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_examples.MICRODATA:
12oclock_girona.mp3


 

      
      Recorded on a terrace of Girona a sunday morning

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个简单描述。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: description

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: George Bush, the 41st President of the United States is the father of George W. Bush, the 43rd President of the United States.
_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.descriptionZh: 标识符
_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:

By John Smith, May 8, 2009

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice

Tags: Low fat
Nutrition facts:

Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

_properties.descriptionZh: 图片
_properties.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
_properties.rdfs:label: image

_examples.MICRODATA:
Cath's Cafe
    Open: Daily from 11:00am till 8pm
    Phone: 555-0100-3344
    View our menu.

      Phone: 555-0100-3344
      View our menu.

    Phone: 555-0100-3344
    View our menu.

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.descriptionZh: 条目的名称
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.descriptionZh: 两个概念等价
_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs

_properties.descriptionZh: 链接
_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: url

_pTree.rdfs:comment: The most generic type of item.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Thing

descriptionZh: 形容某种竞争行为的平局
rdfs:comment: The act of reaching a draw in a competitive activity.
rdfs:label: TieAction
